# Ace Suasola Photography

> Professional concert and wedding photographer based in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada. Specializing in live music photography, wedding day coverage, and creative editorial projects.

## About

Ace Suasola is a professional concert and wedding photographer based in Vancouver, British Columbia. Specializing in live music photography at festivals, club shows, and arena tours, as well as full-day wedding coverage from ceremony to reception. Ace is known for capturing high-energy, authentic moments with a bold, cinematic editing style. Available for bookings across Metro Vancouver, the Fraser Valley, Whistler, and destinations throughout BC and beyond.

## Pages

- [Home](https://acesuasola.com/): Landing page with hero sequence, animated gallery, and introduction to Ace Suasola Photography.
- [Portfolio](https://acesuasola.com/work): A collection of photography work organized into three categories â€” Concerts, Weddings, and Projects.
- [Concerts](https://acesuasola.com/show/concerts): Concert and live music photography portfolio. High-energy images captured at music festivals, intimate club shows, and live performances across Metro Vancouver venues.
- [Weddings](https://acesuasola.com/show/weddings): Wedding photography portfolio. Authentic, candid moments from ceremonies, receptions, and couple portraits across Vancouver and British Columbia.
- [Projects](https://acesuasola.com/show/projects): Creative photography projects and commissioned work. Portraits, editorial shoots, and artistic photography.
- [Contact](https://acesuasola.com/contact): Booking inquiries and contact form. Reach out for concert, wedding, portrait, headshot, or event coverage.

## Services

- **Concert & Live Music Photography**: Concerts, festivals, club shows, and arena tours. Low-light performance photography capturing the raw energy of live music.
- **Wedding Photography**: Full-day wedding coverage including ceremony, reception, and couple portraits. Serving Metro Vancouver, the Fraser Valley, Whistler, and destinations across British Columbia.
- **Creative & Editorial Photography**: Portrait sessions, headshots, editorial shoots, and commissioned creative projects for commercial and personal use.
- **Event Photography**: Private events, corporate events, and music events.

## Skills & Expertise

Concert Photography, Wedding Photography, Live Music Photography, Event Photography, Portrait Photography, Editorial Photography, Festival Photography, Photo Editing and Retouching, Adobe Lightroom, Adobe Photoshop, Low-Light Photography, High-Speed Action Photography, Studio and Natural Lighting, Cinematic Photo Editing, Client Direction, On-Location Shooting.

## Contact

- **Email**: acesuasola@gmail.com
- **Location**: Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada
- **Service Area**: Metro Vancouver, Fraser Valley, Whistler, all of British Columbia, and worldwide by request
